I will not submit to you.
You must earn my respect.
I understand that.
Do you?
I do.
Do you feel a sense of achievement?
In what regard?
In any regard.
I have achieved that which my father never could.
translation.it: Ho realizzato ciò che mio padre non ha fatto.

translation.en: I have united this kingdom in common cause.
translation.it: Ho unito il regno per una causa comune.

translation.en: You have achieved momentary respite.
A unity forged under false pretense will never be a unity that prevails.
translation.it: Un'unità formata con l'inganno non sarà mai un'unità che trionfa.

translation.en: How, pray, have my endeavors been forged falsely?
translation.it: In che modo i miei sforzi sono stati fatti con l'inganno?

translation.en: Why did you bring war to France? Your father came on spoiling.
translation.it: - Perché dichiarare guerra alla Francia? - Vostro padre cercava lo scontro.

translation.en: How so? How was he spoiling?
translation.it: In che modo cercava lo scontro?

translation.en: He sent an assassin.
There was no assassin.
There was no plot to kill you.
How might you know?
Because I was with my father when he received word of your charge.
translation.it: Ero con mio padre, quando ha saputo della vostra accusa.

translation.en: I know him well enough to know his reaction to be genuine.
translation.it: Lo conosco, la sua reazione era sincera.

translation.en: How was his reaction?
He laughed.
He laughed very much. He said you must be drunk.
translation.it: Ha detto che dovevate essere ubriaco.

translation.en: Your father is a madman.
He may be mad, but he is true.
translation.it: Sarà anche pazzo, però è onesto.

translation.en: His madness makes him true. He says only what he believes.
translation.it: La sua follia lo rende sincero. Dice solo quello che pensa.

translation.en: That is why he is loved.
The assassin then was sent by your brother.
-My brother? -Mm-hmm. My brother was too stupid to conjure such a plan.
translation.it: Mio fratello era troppo stupido per pensare a un piano simile.

translation.en: What was your true reason? Did you know of the ball he sent?
translation.it: - Qual era il vostro vero motivo? - Sapete che ha mandato una palla?

translation.en: The ball he sent to me?
A ball?
He sent to you...
-a ball? -Why should you question my intent?
translation.it: Vi ha mandato una palla? Perché mettete in dubbio le mie intenzioni?

translation.en: Your father's rule is illegitimate. He has no right claim to his throne.
translation.it: Il regno di vostro padre è illegittimo, non ha diritto al trono.

translation.en: All monarchy is illegitimate.
You yourself are the son of a usurper.
translation.it: Voi stesso siete figlio di un usurpatore.

translation.en: It would seem that you have no explanation for what you have done.
translation.it: Sembra che non abbiate una spiegazione per ciò che avete fatto.

translation.en: You have shed the blood of so many Christian souls, and yet...
translation.it: Avete sparso il sangue di tantissimi cristiani, eppure...

translation.en: before me now, all I see is a...
translation.it: davanti a me adesso vedo solo...

translation.en: young and vain and foolish man so easily riled.
translation.it: un uomo giovane, frivolo e sciocco, che si infastidisce facilmente.

translation.en: So easily beguiled.
I must leave you now.
[William] Gentle.
We must be sure to revel in this day, my friend.
translation.it: Dobbiamo fare baldoria oggi, amico mio.

translation.en: A crowd has gathered in honor of our victory.
translation.it: La folla si è riunita in onore della nostra vittoria.

translation.en: These are the rare moments for which a king truly lives, I would imagine.
translation.it: Sono questi i rari momenti per i quali vive un re, immagino.

translation.en: In all my preoccupation, I have... neglected to ask after your family.
translation.it: Ero così preoccupato che ho dimenticato di chiederti della tua famiglia.

translation.en: Your preoccupations are hardly trifling.
translation.it: Non sono preoccupazioni futili, le vostre.

translation.en: You have two sons.
I do.
[King Henry V] And...
your wife minds your estate in your absence.
translation.it: tua moglie bada ai tuoi terreni in tua assenza.

translation.en: [William] She does.
Yours is sheep.
You're a man of wool.
As was my father before me.
translation.it: Come mio padre prima di me.

translation.en: How many head?
At last count, some 4,000. Mostly Dorset Horns.
translation.it: L'ultima volta ne ho contati circa 4.000. Per lo più Dorset.

translation.en: How much land have you?
To be true, I'm not...
wholly certain, but...
but many... many hundreds of beautiful, beautiful acres.
translation.it: Però, tante centinaia di bellissimi acri.

translation.en: What lands in France have you now annexed?
translation.it: Di quali terre in Francia ti sei appropriato adesso?

translation.en: [William] Stop.
Now that France is ours, how much of her land is now yours?
translation.it: Ora che la Francia è nostra, quante delle sue terre sono tue?

translation.en: Oh, well...
That has yet to be determined. [chuckles]
Your conquest is so recent.
-Why do you ask this question-- -Stay up there.
-Hmm? -Stay up there.
How did my assassin come to you?
translation.it: Come è venuto da te il mio assassino?

translation.en: I fail to remember the moment.
Remedy this failure.
So much has happened in the intervening months.
translation.it: Sono successe tante cose nel frattempo.

translation.en: An event as pivotal as this one
should be amply equipped to penetrate the fog of time elapsed.
translation.it: dovrebbe essere capace di penetrare la nebbia del passare del tempo.

translation.en: Of course.
Let me recall.
Was it in the street?
Did he come to you in the street?
Yes. Yes, it was in the street.
He approached me... [inhales]
most unusually.
My liege, please, tell me the cause of this concern.
translation.it: Sire, ditemi il motivo di questa preoccupazione.

translation.en: Stay up there.
Stay up there.
Did he know your name?
I don't believe he did.
How, then, did he know who you were to approach?
translation.it: E come sapeva di doversi rivolgere a te?

translation.en: The memory is returning.
He surrendered himself to palace guards
translation.it: Si è consegnato alle guardie di palazzo.

translation.en: and the matter was brought to my attention. I was taken to him.
translation.it: Mi hanno informato della questione e mi hanno portato da lui.

translation.en: So, he did not come to you in the street. No. No, it was not in the street. Forgive me.
translation.it: - Non è venuto da te per strada. - No, non è stato per strada. Perdonatemi.

translation.en: I was summoned to his cell.
translation.it: Mi hanno chiamato nella sua cella.

translation.en: Has a problem arisen...
Yes. A problem has arisen.
And it wobbles before me now on its silly little stool
translation.it: E traballa dinanzi a me sul suo stupido sgabello,

translation.en: -at mine own elevation. -I'm afraid I don't understand.
translation.it: - alla mia altezza. - Temo di non capire.

translation.en: -Please, please, stop this charade. -Sincerely, I do not understand.
translation.it: - Basta con questa farsa. - Sinceramente, non capisco.

translation.en: [yells] Stop the fucking charade! Stop it!
translation.it: Basta con questa farsa, cazzo! Smettila!

translation.en: [yells] I have given you what you wanted, boy!
translation.it: Ti ho dato quello che volevi, ragazzo!

translation.en: Have I not?!
You wanted peace. [yells] Did you not?!
translation.it: Volevi la pace. Non è così?

translation.en: This is how peace is forged.
translation.it: È così che si fa la pace.

translation.en: It is forged in victory.
Listen.
That is the sound of peace.
translation.it: Questo è il suono della pace.

translation.en: That is the sound of your peace.
translation.it: È il suono della tua pace.

translation.en: That is the sound of your greatness.
translation.it: È il suono della tua grandezza.

translation.en: My liege.
I ask nothing of you...
only that you will always speak to me clear and true.
translation.it: solo di parlarmi sempre in modo chiaro e sincero.

translation.en: Always.
Will you promise me only that?
-[crowd] Long live the King! -I will.
[man] Long live the King!
[man] King Henry!
[crowd] King Henry! King Henry!
